thread.title: Woman Caught Having Sex With Dog After Her Graphic Video Appears Online
thread.title_full: Woman Caught Having Sex With Dog After Her Graphic Video Appears Online

author: Amanda Fama
title: Woman Caught Having Sex With Dog After Her Graphic Video Appears Online
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
A 43-year-old woman was arrested after police watched a graphic video online allegedly showing her having sex with a dog. 
Amy Nicole Graves of Hattiesburg, Mississippi, was arrested on Tuesday, February 21 after authorities raided her home following their discovery of the vile video, The Clarion-Ledger reports. 
Graves was taken to the Lamar County Jail on Tuesday afternoon and charged with unnatural intercourse with a dog. 
If she’s convicted, she will need to register as a sex offender. Police 
Sheriff Danny Rigel said, 
We have video evidence of the crime occurring that was posted online, which led us to the search and arrest warrant. 
Rigel said the original tip that led police to the video came from Crime Stoppers. He claimed he’s seen similar situations before, but stated they’re “very rare.” 
Apparently, the crime Graves committed took place within the past year. 
Right now, she waiting for her court appearance in Lamar County Jail and could be sentenced to 10 years in jail if she’s found guilty. 
The dog she is accused of penetrating — whose breed has not been disclosed — is in the care of relatives , The Sun reports. Google Maps 
Unfortunately, this isn’t the first time pet owners have been accused of having sex with their pooches. 
Last month, a man named Bradley Hubbard was caught by his roommate having sex with his pit bull after penetrating her over 100 times throughout the duration of three years. 
His deranged pastime was discovered after his roommate heard moaning and dog shrieks coming from his bedroom. Hubbard was then charged sexual conduct with an animal. 
Another disturbing instance involving beastiality occurred when a firefighter who dressed as a clown to teach kids about fire safety was accused of having intercourse with an innocent pup . 
He was charged with crimes against nature for allegedly having sex with, or having facilitated sex with, a dog. Saving Dogs on Death Row [INSIGHTS] To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
  CITATIONS The Sun & 2 other The Sun
